wines.name: Chateau Montelena
wines.description: The 2018 Chateau Montelena, a Cabernet Sauvignon from California, is a celebration of rich blackcurrant, dark chocolate, and a hint of oak. Every sip reveals a complex palate of ripe fruit flavors and velvety tannins. This full-bodied wine, with its long, sophisticated finish, perfectly complements grilled steak or aged cheese.

wines.name: La Mission
wines.description: La Mission, a 2019 Pinot Noir from the Napa Valley, presents a vibrant bouquet of red fruits, silky tannins, and a hint of spice. Its rich flavor profile, with notes of ripe cherries and strawberries, is elegantly balanced by subtle earthy undertones and a hint of vanilla. Perfect with roasted duck or grilled salmon.

wines.name: Cayuse
wines.description: Our 2020 Merlot, from the vineyards of Bordeaux, is a symphony of bold, ripe fruit flavors. With its deep ruby color, notes of black cherry and plum, and hint of spice, it offers a full-bodied, velvety drinking experience. Pair it with roasted lamb or a hearty cheese platter for a memorable meal.

wines.name: Chateau Beau Sejour
wines.description: This 2017 Zinfandel from Sonoma Valley is a vibrant, fruity wine with a spicy kick. Its intense red fruit flavors, combined with a peppery finish, make this wine a standout. It pairs exceptionally well with barbecued meats or spicy dishes.

wines.name: Chateau Lafite Rothne
wines.description: Our 2019 Sauvignon Blanc, from the vineyards of New Zealand, is a crisp, refreshing wine with a citrusy palate. Its lively acidity and notes of grapefruit and passion fruit make it an excellent companion to seafood or salads.

wines.name: Chateau Latour
wines.description: The 2020 Chardonnay, from the vineyards of Australia, offers a rich and creamy palate with notes of ripe peach, apple, and a hint of vanilla. Its smooth and well-rounded finish makes it a delightful accompaniment to poultry dishes or creamy pastas.

wines.name: Brunello di Montalcino
wines.description: Our 2018 Pinot Grigio, from the vineyards of Italy, is a light-bodied, crisp wine with a clean finish. Its subtle hints of pear and apple make it an excellent aperitif or a companion to light salads and seafood dishes.

wines.name: Verdicchio
wines.description: This 2019 Riesling from Germany is an aromatic, well-balanced wine with a hint of sweetness. Its notes of apricot, honey, and a touch of minerality make it an excellent pairing for spicy dishes, blue cheeses, or desserts.

wines.name: Barolo Ruffino
wines.description: The 2018 Malbec from Argentina is a robust, full-bodied wine with ripe black fruit flavors and a hint of spice. Its rich, dark color and velvety tannins make it a perfect companion to grilled meats or hearty stews.

wines.name: Chateau Mouton-Rothschild
wines.description: Our 2020 Viognier from France is a rich, aromatic wine with a full-bodied palate. Notes of apricot, peach, and honeysuckle, along with a hint of spice, make it a delightful pairing for spicy Asian dishes or rich, creamy cheeses.

wines.name: Chateau Margaux
wines.description: This 2018 Tempranillo from Spain is a medium-bodied wine with notes of red fruits, sweet spices, and a lingering finish. The wine's soft tannins and balanced acidity make it a versatile match for a variety of dishes, from tapas to roasted meats.

wines.name: Chateau Lafite
wines.description: Our 2019 Syrah from the Rhone Valley is a powerful, full-bodied wine with a rich bouquet of dark fruit, black pepper, and a hint of smoke. Its complex flavor profile and smooth tannins make it a perfect match for grilled meats or mature cheeses.
